name: ScratchTips
0:
”Alexa, Open Scratch Tips”
”Launch Scratch Tips”
”Tell Me Scratch Tips”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scratch tips
des: With Scratch, you can program your own interactive stories, games, and animations. Scratch helps young people learn to think creatively, reason systematically, and work collaboratively. This skill tells you some cool tips and tricks for scratch. You can say "Open scratch tips" to ask for tips
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
